dmca.title: [EV1-C1892987D] Copyright violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Tuesday, November 21, 2006 9:21 AM
Posted To: DMCA
Conversation: [EV1-C1892987D] Copyright violation
Subject: [EV1-C1892987D] Copyright violation


==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright violation
Added by system at Tuesday, Nov 21 2006 03:15 pm
X-MailFrom: jeroen@pkmn.nl
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [172.16.220.212] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Tue Nov 21 15:15:19 2006
Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.102]) by

  Tue, 21 Nov 2006 15:12:30 -0600

X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist:  abuse@ev1servers.net

mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id B46CA7340  for
<abuse@ev1servers.net>; Tue, 21 Nov 2006 15:12:29 -0600 (CST)
Received: from [10.0.0.153] (ip503da21d.speed.planet.nl [80.61.162.29])
by smtp18.wxs.nl (iPlanet Messaging Server 5.2 Patch 2 (built Jul 14
2004))  with ESMTP id <0J9300BYTMWD1J@smtp18.wxs.nl> for
abuse@ev1servers.net; Tue,
 21 Nov 2006 22:12:13 +0100 (CET)
Date: Tue, 21 Nov 2006 22:12:05 +0100
From: Jeroen te Strake <jeroen@pkmn.nl>
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Copyright violation
Subject: Copyright violation
To: abuse@ev1servers.net
Message-id: <45636BA5.6020307@pkmn.nl>
MIME-version: 1.0
Content-type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-transfer-encoding: 7BIT
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Win98; en-US; rv:1.7.6)
Gecko/20050317
 Thunderbird/1.0.2 Mnenhy/0.7
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of
TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED
Return-Path: jeroen@pkmn.nl
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 21 Nov 2006 21:12:30.0295 (UTC)
FILETIME=[C112B670:01C70DB1] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear sir, madam, 
 
The scripts hosted at http://www.neocolours.me.uk (kamil.slashcity.com)
are copyrighted by me - I have written them, as can be seen in the
copyright message and will probably be confirmed by the owners. 
 
I have asked them once again to remove them, but they have refused to do
so. 
Because of this, I turn to you. Could you please assist me in ending the
copyright violation on this site? 
 
I am available for any further questions you have regarding this, and
thank you in advance for any assistance you are able to offer me. 
 
With regards, 
 
Jeroen te Strake
